episodes.title: Arrival at Kraghammer
episodes.plot: Our heroes, Vox Machina, travel to the underground, dwarven city of Kraghammer to find the halfling paladin Lady Kima of Vord.

episodes.title: Into the Greyspine Mines
episodes.plot: Vox Machina vows to put an end to a dark power in the bowels of the earth. The party gears up and ventures into the Greyspine Mines.

episodes.title: Strange Bedfellows
episodes.plot: Vox Machina finds a camp of enemies and lures them into an illusion. Soon after, Vex and Keyleth delve into a chasm and discover an unlikely ally.

episodes.title: Attack on the Duergar Warcamp
episodes.plot: Vox Machina forms an alliance with Clarota, an Illithid that also wishes to destroy K'varn, who is oppressing his people. To continue, the party must bypass the Duergar camp controlled by the mind flayer they saw previously. *Q&A follows.

episodes.title: The Trick About Falling
episodes.plot: After their success at the warcamp and their victory over the bulette, Vox Machina takes to the air to make their escape and delve deeper into Khaloor in search of Lady Kima. The quest continues to become more dangerous with every step.

episodes.title: Breaching the Emberhold
episodes.plot: Vox Machina make their way further downward, far below Kraghammer. Through a cavern of obsidian spires, they travel to where Lady Kima is being held: Emberhold. The group manages to sneak in through a secret entrance to help her escape.

episodes.title: The Throne Room
episodes.plot: Vox Machina has rescued Kima, and she has made a grudging alliance with Clarota to defeat K'varn. Tiberius devises a clever plan to confront the dwarven King of Emberhold, but their fight comes at a price.

episodes.title: Glass and Bone
episodes.plot: After their battle with the Duergar King and Queen, Vox Machina is in bad shape. Tiberius and Kima are stone, Vax and Scanlan are injured, and the Queen has kidnapped Grog. The party rests before they continue to meet a new abomination.

episodes.title: Yug'Voril Uncovered
episodes.plot: Tracking down Grog, Vox Machina finds a out more about K'varn. The party then finds their way to a stone island near the city of Yug'voril and takes to the water. The group soon looks for trouble and finds it easily.

episodes.title: K'varn Revealed
episodes.plot: Drawing closer to the city of Yug'voril, the party decides to have Keyleth use a spell to uncover the truth about what K'varn really is. *A Q&A with the cast follows regular game play.

episodes.title: The Temple Showdown
episodes.plot: The party formulates a plan to finally confront and defeat K'varn "The Mad Beholder". *Some cast members play "Just Dance" after regular game play.

episodes.title: Dungeons & Dragons Campaign Tips
episodes.plot: The main story takes a break this week, as Matt gives tips for new Dungeons and Dragons players, as well as beginning the legend of Vox Moronica.

episodes.title: Escape from the Underdark
episodes.plot: With K'Varn defeated, a betrayal forces Vox Machina to flee Yug'voril and the Underdark.

episodes.title: Shopping and Shipping
episodes.plot: Vox Machina and the Council of Tal'Dorei decide how best to dispose of the Horn of Orcus. The team then heads off to acquire some magical gear from their old friend (and corporate sponsor) Gilmore.

episodes.title: Skyward
episodes.plot: In preparation for transport to the holy city of Vasselheim, the Horn of Orcus is sealed within a holy vessel supplied by the followers of Bahamut. Vox Machina defends their Skyship from a small party of Wyvern and Griffin riding pirates.

episodes.title: Enter Vasselheim
episodes.plot: Lady Kima and Vox Machina arrive in Vasselheim. High Bearer Vord asks for assistance in clearing the Platinum Sanctuary's vaults and sealing the Horn of Orcus within.

episodes.title: Hubris
episodes.plot: Pike leaves the group to restore the temple of Sarenrae. Grog faces off against a powerful opponent in the Crucible. The team rushes off to slay a Hydra attacking the walls of Vasselheim.

episodes.title: Trial of the Take: Part 1
episodes.plot: To avoid judgment for illegally hunting a Hydra near Vasselheim, the team attempts to join the "Slayer's Take". The team is split - with Vex, Percy, Scanlan and Grog gaining some new allies as they set off to hunt a vicious white dragon.

episodes.title: Trial of the Take: Part 2
episodes.plot: Fighting their way past blizzards, frost giants, and up an icy mountain cavern, the trial party comes face-to-face with the monstrous white dragon Rimefang.

episodes.title: Trial of the Take: Part 3
episodes.plot: While half of Vox Machina hunts a white dragon, the other half is sent to destroy an elusive Rakshasa. Vax, Keyleth and Tiberius are joined by the mysterious Brother Kashaw and the curmudgeonly Thorbir.

episodes.title: Trial of the Take: Part 4
episodes.plot: With the Rakshasa's identity revealed, the team continues their pursuit, fighting their way through monsters, spirits and a river of acid.

episodes.title: AraMente to Pyrah
episodes.plot: After successfully completing their trials, Vox Machina is inducted into the Slayer's Take. The team then sets out with an apprehensive Keyleth toward Pyrah, home of the Fire Ashari.

episodes.title: The Rematch
episodes.plot: Grog returns to The Crucible for a rematch with Kern. Scanlan and Vex break Tiberius and Keyleth out of jail. Percy goes shopping.

episodes.title: The Feast
episodes.plot: Percy reveals a bit of his past after Vox Machina is invited to a feast celebrating the arrival of Lord and Lady Briarwood.

episodes.title: Crimson Diplomacy
episodes.plot: The team desperately tries to rescue Vax from Lord and Lady Briarwood. A mysterious tiefling wizard reveals herself and jumps to Vox Machina's aid.

episodes.title: Consequences and Cows
episodes.plot: Vox Machina's actions following their battle with the Briarwoods causes Uriel to question whether they are the heroes they claim to be. Removed from the city council, they attempt to repair their reputation by aiding a nearby cattle farm.

episodes.title: The Path to Whitestone
episodes.plot: Vox Machina defends their witness from both Percy and invisible assassins. When Seeker Asum suggests that Uriel might be under the Briarwood's control, and that a fair trial may not be possible, the team decides to travel to Whitestone.

episodes.title: The Sun Tree
episodes.plot: Vox Machina battles a serpentine Behir. The team slips into Whitestone and discovers a horrific message waiting for them at the Sun Tree.

episodes.title: Whispers
episodes.plot: Vox Machina attacks the cruel Sir Kerrion Stonefell in an effort to inspire the citizens of Whitestone to rebel against the Briarwoods.

episodes.title: Stoke the Flames
episodes.plot: Vox Machina reaches out to the Whitestone resistance. Percy learns more about the fate of his sister Cassandra.

episodes.title: Gunpowder Plot
episodes.plot: Vox Machina continues to move against the new nobles. Scanlan creates a ballad worthy diversion. After game play, Critmas ensues, opening gifts and letters from fans.

episodes.title: Against the Tide of Bone
episodes.plot: With the rebellion in full swing, the Briarwoods send a seemingly endless army of undead to quell the unrest. A familiar looking avatar of Sarenrae arrives to aid the party.

episodes.title: Reunions
episodes.plot: Vox Machina sneaks into Castle Whitestone in search of the Briarwoods and Cassandra De Rolo. The team recruits an unlikely ally.

episodes.title: Race to the Ziggurat
episodes.plot: Brother fights sister as Vox Machina battles the Briarwoods deep underneath Whitestone.

episodes.title: Denouement
episodes.plot: Vox Machina helps Percy face his personal demons.

episodes.title: Winter's Crest in Whitestone
episodes.plot: The Briarwoods defeated, Vox Machina takes some time off from rebuilding Whitestone to participate in the Winter's Crest festival.

episodes.title: A Musician's Nostalgia
episodes.plot: Vox Machina presents themselves to Emperor Uriel, and then heads into the city to capture Riskel Daxio. Scanlan bumps into his old band, Dr. Dranzel's Spectacular Traveling Troupe.

episodes.title: Echoes of the Past
episodes.plot: Kaylie reveals her intent to the unsuspecting Scanlan. Vox Machina agrees to investigate the former residence of General Krieg.

episodes.title: Omens
episodes.plot: Vox Machina tangles with some monstrous worms while investigating Brimscythe's cavern. An evil artifact speaks to Grog. Emperor Uriel gives an important announcement in the Cloud Top District.

episodes.title: Desperate Measures
episodes.plot: After fending off one of the attacking dragons, the party takes refuge in their keep, and a potentially dangerous solution to the dragon problem causes a rift between the members of Vox Machina.

episodes.title: In Ruins
episodes.plot: Vox Machina ventures into Emon in search of Gilmore, Uriel, and any surviving allies within the city's ruined walls. Along the way they make a new ally, Garthok of the Clasp.

episodes.title: Dangerous Dealings
episodes.plot: Vox Machina tries to secure an alliance with the Clasp. Following their meeting, the adventurers make a difficult decision regarding their home.

episodes.title: Return to Vasselheim
episodes.plot: Seeking aid against Thordak, Vox Machina visits the leaders of Vasselheim. Allies rally to the team, and lore is acquired as they visit the Slayer's Take, the Platinum Sanctuary, and the Temple of Kord.

episodes.title: The Sunken Tomb
episodes.plot: Vox Machina finds itself deep within a lost shrine to the Raven Queen in search of an artifact that may help them defeat the Chroma conclave. But more danger lurks within the shrine than they could possibly be prepared for.

episodes.title: Those Who Walk Away...
episodes.plot: An exhausted Vox Machina spends some time hashing out their pent up frustrations and examining their spoils of victory. They then journey to the Fire Ashari, hoping to find survivors of the red dragon's escape from the fire plane.

episodes.title: Cindergrove Revisited
episodes.plot: Vox Machina joins forces with an eccentric candlemaker to help seal the rift between their world and the fire plane.

episodes.title: The Family Business
episodes.plot: Vox Machina return to Westruun, and learn that an unexpected nemesis has taken up residence inside the city.

episodes.title: Into the Frostweald
episodes.plot: To find out more about the Vestiges, Vox Machina travel to the Frostweald to find the Sphinx's lair, but encounter familiar dangers along the way.

episodes.title: A Name Is Earned
episodes.plot: To obtain important information about the Vestiges, Vox Machina must pass a series of deadly tests and earn the respect of the Sphinx.

episodes.title: Best Laid Plans...
episodes.plot: In their 50th episode, Vox Machina creates a plan to infiltrate Westruun to retrieve the Vestige within and Grog learns the true strength of Craven Edge. Regular game play is followed by Critmas.

episodes.title: Test of Pride
episodes.plot: Scanlan deals with a surprising reunion. Meanwhile, the rest of Vox Machina push further into Westruun in order for Grog to challenge his Uncle Kevdak to single combat.

episodes.title: The Kill Box
episodes.plot: When Grog struggles to beat Kevdak by himself he calls the rest of the team to action, sparking a ferocious and bloody battle.

episodes.title: At Dawn, We Plan!
episodes.plot: Vox Machina reach an uneasy truce with former enemies. They use this moment to look for Pike's great-grandfather Wilhand. Tasked with finding an artifact for Quall, they go to his former workshop. Plans are made to make a plan, at dawn.

episodes.title: In the Belly of the Beast
episodes.plot: Vox Machina start to put a plan together to fight the ancient black dragon. Taking stock of their surroundings, Percy tries to cobble together a dragon trap, while Vax, Vex, and Scanlan discuss a last ditch plan for Scanlan to give the dragon intestinal discomfort. Meanwhile, Grog finds an old friend.

episodes.title: Umbrasyl
episodes.plot: As Umbrasyl attempts escape with Scanlan, Vax and Grog still battling from their respective places within and atop the dragon, the rest of Vox Machina desperately try to keep up and take down their first dragon of the Chroma Conclave.

episodes.title: Hope
episodes.plot: Fearing retribution from the Chroma Conclave for killing Umbrasyl, Vox Machina helps the surviving villagers of Westruun to build an underground bunker.

episodes.title: Duskmeadow
episodes.plot: With Westruun now liberated, Vox Machina makes a short trip to Vasselheim for Vax to keep his promise to the Raven Queen. Once concluded, they proceed to Whitestone for rest, but are they truly safe there?

episodes.title: A Cycle of Vengeance
episodes.plot: When Gilmore is revealed to be Hotis in disguise, Vox Machina attempt to fend off the Rakshasa's assassination attempt.

episodes.title: The Feywild
episodes.plot: Vox Machina travel to the mystical plane of the Feywild in search of another Vestige. When they meet a potential guide, Vex and Vax agree to a deal that they soon regret.

episodes.title: Heredity and Hats
episodes.plot: Live at Landmark Theatre - To fulfill their pact with the satyr Garmelie so that he will guide them to the Shademirk Bog, Vox Machina travel to the plane-shifted city of Syngorn to meet with Vex and Vax's father.

episodes.title: Denizens of the Moonbrush
episodes.plot: Garmelie guides Vox Machina through a dark forest known as the Moonbrush, but the group soon finds trouble with its inhabitants.

episodes.title: Uninviting Waters
episodes.plot: Live from GenCon - Now free of the Moonbrush, Vox Machina continues towards the Shademirk Bog, but the rivers of the Gilded Run surround their destination and are more dangerous than they first appear.

episodes.title: The Echo Tree
episodes.plot: The group arrives at the hollow tree, only to find the bow's previous owner still lives. Will Vex be willing to accept his offer for it though?

episodes.title: The Frigid Doom
episodes.plot: Vox Machina continue their quest to rid the world of the Chroma Conclave by scouting the lair of the White Dragon in Draconia. There they are forced to bid a final farewell to a brave old friend.

episodes.title: The Streets of Ank'Harel
episodes.plot: With a two week time limit in place for their return to Draconia, Vox Machina make their way to the desert city of Ank'Harel to find another vestige to further even their odds against the dragons.

episodes.title: A Traveler's Gamble
episodes.plot: Vox Machina must fight against a powerful opponent to prove their worth to a potential new ally. Afterwards, they head to the casino for Scanlan to complete his spice deal.

episodes.title: The Chase to Glintshore
episodes.plot: Vox Machina make preparations to set out and track down Dr. Ripley after determining that she has been hunting the remaining vestiges for herself.

episodes.title: Cloak and Dagger
episodes.plot: After tracking Dr. Ripley and her team to the centre of the island, Vox Machina decides to strike. As the fight drags on, some of them begin to fear that not all of them will walk away from this battle unscathed...

episodes.title: Passed Through Fire
episodes.plot: After defeating Dr. Ripley, Vox Machina rush to Whitestone for Pike to resurrect Percy, but Orthax interrupts the ritual. Events continue to turn from bad to worse as the Whitestone spy finally emerges.

episodes.title: Trust
episodes.plot: Raishan attempts to pursuade Vox Machina to help her take down Thordak, but they are understandably distrustful. After a tenuous agreement is met, the group undertakes thorough research into a fiend as they develop a plan to kill Vorugal.

episodes.title: Vorugal
episodes.plot: Vox Machina, accompanied by Lady Kima, return to Draconia to enact their daring plan to take down Vorugal.

episodes.title: The Elephant in the Room
episodes.plot: With Vorugal now slain, Vox Machina set about gathering money and items from his treasure horde. Keyleth tests her new Vestige, Grog gifts Kima with a new weapon and Vex finds a quiet moment to open up to Percy.

episodes.title: The Coming Storm
episodes.plot: Vox Machina meet with Allura, Cassandra and the rest of the council to create a plan to finally retake Emon from Thordak. Vax tries to make amends with Gilmore and Kynan in case he doesn't return.

episodes.title: Path of Brass
episodes.plot: Vox Machina travel to Fort Daxio and help the remaining soldiers to prepare for Thordak's attack. Once complete, and with time to spare as they wait for reinforcements, they continue on to the fire plane to search for the final Vestige.

episodes.title: Where the Cards Fall
episodes.plot: Having befriended two of the fire plane's denizens and enlisting their help, Vox Machina now need to deal with the fire giants to get the vestige. In the end, their fate comes down to the luck of the draw.

episodes.title: Brawl in the Arches
episodes.plot: After Scanlan lost the card game to the Fire Giant, Juuraiel, they have now become her slaves. To win their freedom, as well as the Vestige, they must now kill a pit fiend who holds a high position within the city.

episodes.title: Clash at Daxio
episodes.plot: Having returned from the Fire Plane to find Fort Daxio under siege by Thordak's forces, Vox Machina plunge into the fray in the hopes of retaking their rally point.

episodes.title: The Siege of Emon
episodes.plot: Vox Machina, with the help of Zahra and Kashaw, make their final preparations and create a battle plan before beginning the siege of Emon.

episodes.title: Thordak
episodes.plot: After months of questing for the powerful Vestiges of Divergence and hunting down the other members of the Chroma Conclave, Vox Machina finally battle with Thordak, the Cinder King atop the ruins of Emon's cloudtop district.

episodes.title: Raishan
episodes.plot: Vox Machina fight Raishan in Thordak's lair, but with their wounds still fresh from their previous battle, are they strong enough to stop her?

episodes.title: What Lies Beneath the Surface
episodes.plot: After Raishan absconded with two of the eggs and Thordak's body, Vox Machina return to Whitestone to scry and research her location with the assistance of Allura and Kerrek.

episodes.title: Deadly Echoes
episodes.plot: Vox Machina travel to the island where Raishan is hiding, but to reach her they must navigate the deadly ancient traps left by the necromancer who once called this place home.

episodes.title: The Deceiver's Stand
episodes.plot: Vox Machina find and attack Raishan, who is attempting a dangerous ritual with Thordak's body.

episodes.title: Loose Ends
episodes.plot: Vox Machina attempt a resurrection spell on Scanlan with his daughter's help. Following their efforts, they then transport themselves to Vasselheim to keep their promise to Senokir.

episodes.title: A Bard's Lament
episodes.plot: Grog must fight against Earthbreaker Groon in a rematch to show how much he has learned since their last encounter. Upon their return to Whitestone, Scanlan has woken from his coma, but he has bad news for the rest of the group.

episodes.title: Daring Days
episodes.plot: As they lament over the loss of Scanlan, Vox Machina continue to finish off their remaining side-quests whilst learning more about their new companion, Taryon Darrington.

episodes.title: Onward to Vesrah
episodes.plot: Vox Machina board a ship to take them to the Water Ashari for Keyleth to complete her Auramente, but their route is known to contain many dangers.

episodes.title: Tangled Depths
episodes.plot: Keyleth leads Vox Machina into the depths of the ocean to cross over into the water plane and recover three load-stones from a kraken.

episodes.title: Curious Tides
episodes.plot: Pike is summoned in her astral form to revive Vax after a battle with the kraken goes sour. During the ritual, Vex makes a desperate deal with the Raven Queen for her brother's life.

episodes.title: Voice of the Tempest
episodes.plot: After a nights rest at Grey Skull Keep, Vox Machina set out to Vasselheim to research the Nine Hells and Orcus. With their work done, the ladies buy new gowns for Keyleth's Auramente ceremony.

episodes.title: Vox Machina Go to Hell
episodes.plot: Vox Machina travel to the city of Dis, located in the second layer of the Hells to search for and kill Hotis before he has regenerated enough to attempt to assassinate Vax and Pike.

episodes.title: Deals in the Dark
episodes.plot: After being offered a deal for assistance with entering the prison in which Hotis is being held in exchange for killing a pit fiend, Vox Machina try to decide whether it is truly their best option.

episodes.title: Bats Out of Hell
episodes.plot: After their battle with the pit fiend, Vox Machina, with their new ally Tova, are taken to the labyrinthine Bastion of Flesh where they must navigate their way to Hotis' cell and kill him once and for all.

episodes.title: Jugs and Rods
episodes.plot: Taryon, with help and encouragement from the others, attempts to flirt with the local barmaid. The next day, Vex must prepare herself and set out on the Grey Hunt.

episodes.title: One Year Later...
episodes.plot: Having completed all of their quests, Vox Machina split up to attend to more personal matters over the course of a year.

episodes.title: Family Matters
episodes.plot: Pike's Uncle warns her of a family curse that may be about to affect her. To save her and avoid this fate they must perform a potentially dangerous ritual.

episodes.title: Taryon, My Wayward Son
episodes.plot: After Taryon is kidnapped during the night by a Drow, the rest of Vox Machina follow his trail to Wildmount in an attempt to rescue him.

episodes.title: The Mines of the Many
episodes.plot: Taryon strikes a deal with his father's partners to erase the debt his family owes them by offering Vox Machina's services to clear out an infested mine.

episodes.title: Masquerade
episodes.plot: As Vox Machina explore the market in Whitestone, a Half-Orc named Lionel approaches them with a message from "The Meat Man" - an alter ego of their old friend Scanlan Shorthalt.

episodes.title: Unfinished Business
episodes.plot: Vox Machina follow Scanlan and Lionel to the second ziggurat, but are shocked to find one of their long-defeated enemies still lives.

episodes.title: Thar Amphala
episodes.plot: Vox Machina travel to the Shadowfell in an attempt to stop Vecna from being resurrected by Delilah Briarwood.

episodes.title: Race to the Tower
episodes.plot: All hell breaks loose as Vox Machina race to stop the return of Vecna.

episodes.title: The Fate-Touched
episodes.plot: Vox Machina regroup after their devastating defeat at the hands of Vecna, all while Vax's soul is tested by the Matron of Ravens.

episodes.title: Elysium
episodes.plot: We journey to Elysium, where Vox Machina must prove their worth in the eyes of the gods.

episodes.title: The Fear of Isolation
episodes.plot: Vox Machina travel to the pools of Wittebak where they meet a lonely stranger residing in a strange old house.

episodes.title: The Endless Atheneeum
episodes.plot: Vox Machina race against time to earn the blessing of the Goddess of Knowledge while Vecna continues to gain power.

episodes.title: Scaldseat
episodes.plot: Vox Machina descend into the heart of an undersea volcano to find the forge of the gods.

episodes.title: The Core Anvil
episodes.plot: Upon finding the Core Anvil and the forge guardian that protects it, Vox Machina attempt to create the divine trammels that will aid in their fight against Vecna.

episodes.title: The Ominous March
episodes.plot: Live from Gencon: Vox Machina returns to Vasselheim to prepare for the coming of Vecna.

episodes.title: The Climb Within
episodes.plot: Vox Machina find treasures, horrors, and mysteries as they make their way through the body of an undead primordial.

episodes.title: Shadows of Thomara
episodes.plot: Vox Machina make their way through the cursed caverns of the undead dwarven city of Thomara, hoping their presence won't be discovered.

episodes.title: Dark Dealings
episodes.plot: Vox Machina search for a powerful artifact that could help swing the tide in their favor.

episodes.title: The Final Ascent
episodes.plot: Vox Machina, having made their final preparations, make their way to the top of the tower of Entropis.

episodes.title: Vecna, the Ascended
episodes.plot: The final battle against Vecna has come. Vox Machina with the help of allies must face against the newly made god.

episodes.title: The Chapter Closes
episodes.plot: On the final episode of Vox Machina's campaign, victory is celebrated, and all debts are paid.

episodes.title: Critical Role Live at Comic-Con 2015
episodes.plot: The main story takes a break this week as the cast takes the stage at San Diego Comic-Con.

episodes.title: Critical Role: Critical Trolls for Extra Life!
episodes.plot: In this special episode for the charity Extra Life, we once again join Salty Pete, Snugglelord, and Ulfgar Fireforge as Vox Moronica continue their adventures.

episodes.title: Gunpowder Plot, pt. 3-Critmas!
episodes.plot: November's Critmas. The cast open your letters and presents and share all the love with the community.

episodes.title: Denouement: Critmas Bonus!
episodes.plot: It's December Critmas. The cast opens your letters and gifts and shares the love with community.

episodes.title: Critical Role Q&A and Battle Royale
episodes.plot: The gang hold a Q&A to answer questions from fans before engaging in a four-way free for all.

episodes.title: Critical Role Invades GameSpot
episodes.plot: A special one-shot from the folks at Critical Role and GameSpot. At the behest of a wealthy benefactor, The Swamp Lords are tasked with locating the source of a poisonous substance that's driving people crazy and affecting his bottom line.

episodes.title: To the Poop! The Goblins: A Pathfinder One-Shot
episodes.plot: A one-shot Pathfinder game where the players take on the roles of goblins hunting down a valuable trinket.

episodes.title: Critical Role Q&A and Battle Royale!: Take II
episodes.plot: The main story takes a break this week as we get a Q&A with the cast and a battle royale to end the night.

episodes.title: Deadlands One-Shot for MDA Charity
episodes.plot: On a special episode, Geek and Sundry and Smart Girls team up for an MDA charity stream. Critical Role cast members do a Deadlands one-shot, with the audience allowed to participate by donating and choosing a way to affect the story.

episodes.title: Critical Role EXTRA : Liam's Quest!
episodes.plot: With Matt and Marisha out of town, Liam O'Brien takes the helm as the DM. What starts as a seemingly normal day in the lives of voice actors Travis, Laura, Taliesin, and Sam takes a turn for the weird...In a series of events that need to be seen but cannot truly be explained, watch as Liam takes his friends through the strangest voice over job of their lives. Special appearance as NPC's by Ashley Johnson, Matt Mercer, Marisha Ray, and a surprise guest.

episodes.title: Critical Role - Live at Comic Con!
episodes.plot: Live from San Diego Comic Con, the cast participates in a "Dating Game" type panel.

episodes.title: Critical Role Live at San Diego Comic Con 2!
episodes.plot: Live from San Diego Comic Con, the cast participate in a Q&A.

episodes.title: Critical Role Extra - The Return of Liam!
episodes.plot: Set before the Chroma Conclave destroyed Emon, four members of The Clasp and their captive attempt to pull off a dangerous heist. But when each of them have their own hidden motives, who can they truly trust?

episodes.title: Liam's Quest: Full Circle
episodes.plot: Liam takes control once again, as we follow our cast through the darkest timeline.

episodes.title: Shadow of War Part 1
episodes.plot: SPECIAL EPISODE: A special one-shot RPG inspired by the upcoming video game Middle-earth: Shadow of War. Join Dungeon Master and voice actor Matthew Mercer as he leads fellow voice actors Laura Bailey, Darin De Paul, Sam Riegel and Travis Willingham through Mordor as a group of Orcs from the Marauder tribe against a mysterious new enemy.

episodes.title: Battle Royale One Shot
episodes.plot: Level 17 Battle Royale, Vex, Keyleth, Taryon, Percy and Grog battle to the death in an arena.

episodes.title: Shadow of War Part 2
episodes.plot: SPECIAL EPISODE: This week, Critical Role sits down to play a special one-shot RPG inspired by the upcoming video game Middle-earth: Shadow of War. Join Dungeon Master and voice actor Matthew Mercer as he leads fellow voice actors Laura Bailey, Darin De Paul, Sam Riegel and Travis Willingham through Mordor as a group of Orcs from the Marauder tribe against a mysterious new enemy.

episodes.title: Bar Room Blitz
episodes.plot: In a bustling tavern nestled on the outskirts of the winter worn village of Jorenn, an unlikely collection of misfits find themselves swept up in a bar room brawl for the ages.

episodes.title: Thursday by Night
episodes.plot: Taliesin Jaffe leads the cast of Critical Role through a game of Vampire: The Masquerade, in a dark and twisted version of the world they know.

episodes.title: Thursday by Night Part 2
episodes.plot: Taliesin Jaffe takes the CR cast through a dark yet strangely familiar world of vampires, werewolves, and other assorted creatures of the night.

episodes.title: Grog's One Shot
episodes.plot: Grog has discovered a new game called Bunions and Flagons, during some down time in Scanlan's magnificent mansion he invites Vax, Vex, Percy and Scanlan to try it out.

episodes.title: Trinket's Honey Heist
episodes.plot: Bear Master Marisha Ray leads Trinket and Co. through a hilarious session of Honey Heist on tonight's Critical Role One-Shot.

episodes.title: Once Upon a Fairytale Cruise
episodes.plot: In this one-shot, Sam plays Dungeon Master as a cast of characters, the Queen of Hearts, Goldilocks, The Hatter, Peter Pan, Wendy Darling, and Scarecrow go on a fairytale singles cruise looking for love and a storybook happy ending.

episodes.title: Kobolds, Catacombs and Dragons (Oh My!)
episodes.plot: Matt Mercer returns to the DM chair for a one-shot World of Warcraft-set adventure where the Burning Legion has set upon an apocalyptic march on Azeroth and the forces of the Horde and Alliance have come together to stop them.

episodes.title: Epic Level Battle Royale
episodes.plot: Matt Mercer DMs the cast of Sam Riegel, Taliesin Jaffe, Marisha Ray, Liam O'Brien and Travis Willingham (all of whom are playing their beloved Vox Machina characters) in yet another epic battle royale for the pleasure of a mysterious, all-powerful being.
